listitem.para: 2022-2024 Tarun Kumar Mitruka Vinod Kumar Mitruka

detaileddescription.para: We use REUSE software to manage our licenses. All licenses reside in the folder LICENSES. Each source file here has the corresponding header for license information. The Ikarus source and header files are released under LGPL-3.0-or-later.

Only ikarus/linearAlgebra/truncatedConjugateGradient.hh adapted from the Eigen library is released under LGPL-3.0-or-later along with their own license (MPL-2.0). The documentation files are released under CC-BY-SA-4.0. Several minor files are released under the public domain CC0-1.0.
